contents.item: README.txt How to build the docs
developer.sgml Demo of an SGML-Version of the AROS docs
developer HTML docs generated from developer.sgml
faq The FAQ is generated from these files. The files are numbered and will appear in this order in the FAQ. The date of the file will be used to determine if this FAQ has been updated.
src The sources for the docs
other Other material (eg. articles sent to magazines and NEWS groups)
